```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Import package
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
# Check invalid lines for head and tail
all_lines <- readLines("whether_dementia_raw_2021.csv")
length(all_lines) 
head(all_lines, 11)
tail(all_lines, 9)
```

```{r}
# Remove invalid lines
clean_lines <- all_lines[10:(length(all_lines) - 9)]

# define temporary file name
temp_file <- "whether_dementia_temp_2021.csv"

# Save temporary file for document
writeLines(clean_lines, temp_file)

# read temporary file
whether_dementia_2021 <- read_csv(temp_file)

# Display data frame
head(whether_dementia_2021)
```

```{r}
# Remove NA column
whether_dementia_2021 <- whether_dementia_2021 %>% select(where(~ !all(is.na(.))))

# Remove 'Total' column
whether_dementia_2021 <- whether_dementia_2021 %>% select(-Total)

# Remove 'SA2 (UR)' row
whether_dementia_2021 <- whether_dementia_2021 %>% filter(.[[1]] != "SA2 (UR)")

# Rename sa2 
whether_dementia_2021 <- whether_dementia_2021 %>% rename(sa2 = `HDEMP Whether has Dementia (including Alzheimer's)`)

# Check data frame
head(whether_dementia_2021)

write_csv(whether_dementia_2021, "whether_dementia_nsw_2021.csv")
```
